t: Trolls | Universal Studios Wiki | Fandom
s: January 18, 2025 - Trolls is a 2016 American 3D computer-animated musical film based on the Troll dolls created by Thomas Dam. The film was directed by Mike Mitchell and co-directed by Walt Dohrn, written by Jonathan Aibel and Glenn Berger and based on a story by Erica Rivinoja. and distributed by 20th Century Fox.
